resources.string:
Hi, my name is Winnie. 

I love gaming. 

Spending my free time in gaming, its just my type of day. 
Fortunately is that I have plenty of time to spare everyday. 

I like watching movies too. K-Drama, Anime, TVB, J-Drama - not so much. 
And sometimes I become so addicted I spend my whole day. 
Even though I love gaming and is addicted, but I know the limits. 

I only play games when I'm free and done with the essentials. 

I know how to balance out my life. 
Gaming is so fun! I am very happy that I found gaming in my life.
